description: The DST OS actor is the process identified by the operation system on the remote host as the process that performed an action that was responsible for the entire chain of execution.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_causality_id
fields.description: Causality chain ID.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_effective_user_sid
fields.description: Win: Primary user token of the executed binary. Unix: Effective UID of the executed binary.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_effective_username
fields.description: Effective username

fields.name: dst_os_actor_is_injected_thread
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the thread is injected.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_primary_user_sid
fields.description: Win: Primary user token of the executed binary. Unix: Effective UID of the executed binary.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_primary_username
fields.description: Name assigned to the user_sid.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_auth_id
fields.description: Windows: LUID (uint64) representing the token of the process.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_causality_id
fields.description: Process causality chain ID.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_command_line
fields.description: Process command line - The command used to execute the process.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_command_line_indices
fields.description: Process command line - The command used to execute the process.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_device_info
fields.description: Info about the device (volume + HW) from which this process started. including name, class guid, class name, bus type, volume guid, mount point, file system, drive type, vendor id, product id, and serial number.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_execution_time
fields.description: Process execution time in epoch time.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_file_access_time
fields.description: Access time of the file that created the process.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_file_create_time
fields.description: Creation time of the file that created the process.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_file_mod_time
fields.description: Modification time of the file that created the process.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_file_size
fields.description: Size of the file involved in the process in bytes.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_image_command_line
fields.description: Process command line - The command used to execute the process.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_image_extension
fields.description: Process image extension - File extension.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_image_md5
fields.description: MD5 of the binary.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_image_name
fields.description: Process image name.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_image_path
fields.description: Process image path - A string identifying the location of the execution.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_image_sha256
fields.description: SHA256 of the binary.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_instance_id
fields.description: Process instance ID.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_integrity_level
fields.description: Integrity level of the process.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_is_64bit
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the process is 64-bit.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_is_native
fields.description: Indicates whether or not this process is a 'native process'. On a 32-bit machine, the value is always true, and on 64-bit machine, the value is true, if the process is 64-bit.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_is_replay
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the process event data is replayed or not. Replayed means that the agent sent the data after the action occurred, for example, after a reboot.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_is_special
fields.description: Indicates special system processes: RegularProcess = 0, KernelProcess = 1, AppContainerProcess = 2, NonWin32SubsystemProcess = 3

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_logon_id
fields.description: Windows: LUID (uint64) representing the token of the process.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_os_pid
fields.description: The Operating System (OS) Process Identifier (PID) of the destination operating system actor process.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_session_id
fields.description: Windows: Session ID of the process.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_signature_is_embedded
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the signature is embedded inside the Program Executable or part of an external catalog file.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_signature_product
fields.description: Signature product - The product family part of the signature.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_signature_status
fields.description: Signature status of the process: Signed = 1, SignedInvalid = 2, Unsigned = 3, FailedToObtain = 4, WeakHash = 5, Unsupported = 6, InvalidCVE2020_0601 = 7, Deleted = 8

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_signature_vendor
fields.description: Signature vendor - The vendor part of the signature.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_remote_host
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor and the host was resolved successfully.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_remote_ip
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor, where the type is not local and the IP was resolved successfully.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_remote_port
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor, where the type is RemoteRpcTcp.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_session_id
fields.description: Windows: Session ID of the process.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_thread_thread_id
fields.description: An identifier of the Operating System (OS) thread responsible for the event.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_type
fields.description: Operating System actor type: Local = 1, RemoteRpcNamedPipe = 2, RemoteRpcHttp = 3, RemoteRpcTcp = 4, RemoteFileSmb = 5

fields.name: dst_os_actor_container_info
fields.description: Container information for the process.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_image_auth_sha1
fields.description: Process image SHA-1 authenticode.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_image_auth_sha2
fields.description: The process image SHA-2 authenticode.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_last_writer_actor
fields.description: Cortex instance ID of the last process that has written the os actor process image.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_rpc_func_opnum
fields.description: MS-RPC function operation identitifer.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_rpc_interface_version_major
fields.description: MS-RPC interface major version.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_rpc_interface_version_minor
fields.description: MS-RPC interface minor version.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_rpc_protocol
fields.description: MS-RPC protocol type.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_rpc_interface_uuid
fields.description: MS-RPC interface unique identifier.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_file_original_name
fields.description: Original file name of the destination os actor image based on the file information metadata.

fields.name: dst_os_actor_process_file_internal_name
fields.description: Internal name of the destination os actor image based on the file information metadata.
